about_the_game:
This Happily Ever After DLC continues your relationship storyline with Priscilla the Stars Reach Princess!


STORY

The new Queen Priscilla will be holding a grand tournament to win her hand in marriage and you are invited... as a spectator. Even though you are not eligible of entering due to your humble farm boy descent and not a noble of a neighboring country, that doesn't mean there isn't adventure and romance to be had!

Will you fight for the Queen's hand in marriage?

Faulty Apprentice Fifth DLC-- Rose Tournament!

This DLC update takes place after the GOOD ENDING in the Base game/Main Story. You will also need a save data from Day 20. This DLC contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Sexual Content! - Since this is the Happily Ever After sequel as Priscilla's lover, you can now engage in an intimate moment with the Queen, all the way. No more black screen!
  • Two Different Paths - Would you dominate Priscilla? Or let Priscilla dominate you? That choice is all up to you.
  • Fully Voiced! - This DLC features a full English voiceover from the beginning till the end!

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Join the conversation here or Faulty Apprentice official , and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18 and older.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
